summary: This is a complete list of the states of the United States ordered by total area, land area, and water area.
full_text: This is a complete list of the states of the United States and its major territories ordered by total area, land area, and water area. The water area figures include inland, coastal, Great Lakes, and territorial waters. Glaciers and intermittent water features are counted as land area.
title: List of U.S. states and territories by area
